author: Stephanie Bedard-Chateauneuf
title: The Economy Is Crashing But Booze Sales are Booming Amid Coronavirus
description: Booze sales have exploded as Americans stay at home due to COVID-19, but this trend might not last as millions of workers lose their jobs. The post The Economy Is Crashing But Booze Sales are Booming Amid Coronavirus appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Consumer spending has slowed down in many areas, but alcohol sales are booming.
  • Americans cannot go out to restaurants and bars, so they drink alcohol at home to pass the time and handle the stress.
